events.title: Ice Spice: Y2K! World Tour
events.location: Miami Beach, Florida, United States Of America
events.description: Door Time: 7:00 PM Show Time: 8:00 PM GA Tickets stand for General Admission. This means there is no assigned seating. These areas are standing and seated and are a first come, first served basis. Please know that once an area's capacity has been reached you will be limited to other open areas.
